channel.title: VPN through Tor
channel.description:
Hey! I know the Workstation isnt supposed to let anything go around Tor, but as I havent fully grasped the design yet, I just wanted to be certain.
When I connect to an OpenVPN server with the simple "sudo openvpn config.ovpn" command, the VPN server will only see the Tor IP, true? Also this goes no matter how the VPN is configured, right?
Thank you in advance!

item.title: VPN through Tor
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
phonix:

When I connect to an OpenVPN server with the simple “sudo openvpn config.ovpn” command, the VPN server will only see the Tor IP, true? Also this goes no matter how the VPN is configured, right?

Yes. See also:
